version_description: Bug fixes and improvements.

Bug fixes and improvements.
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements

5 New Vehicles

Special Value pack of Monster Trucks

General Bug fixes
Bug Fixes and optimisations
To celebrate the release of Faily Skater we are giving away a themed car and costume! There is also 3 Skater themed cars and bug fixes and improvements

· Introducing a limited time only Japan Theme!
· 8 new Drift cars
· 2 new Japan costumes"

Happy Halloween! Please enjoy 'Spooky Fields' for a limited time
Receive a new car and costume yours to keep even after the promotion!
Please enjoy Bumpy Horror for a limited time!

"Happy Holidays!
Play over the Holiday weekend (22nd -25th Dec) and received a special daily Present.
The ‘Holiday Themed’ track also comes with a free Car and Costume, yours to keep when the Theme disappears in the New Year.
Thanks for playing the ‘Faily’ Games and all the best for 2018 from Phil, Anita and team at Spunge Games."
Happy New Year! All the best for 2018 from Phil Faily and the team at Spunge Games

"Faily Brakes is turning two!

To celebrate Phil’s ‘coming’ of age – Faily Brakes has received a major update.

Phil is heading back to the 80s in this futuristic synthwave, retro-electro inspired update.

Included as part of the update:
· ‘Secret’ Cars - hidden in the new level and available for a limited time
· The Dynamic ‘Retro Future’ Theme - 2.0 levels with moving hazards and underground caverns
· New Store – improved flow and ability to select costumes, theme and car from a single screen
· ‘Classic’ themes remain - including an updated Faily Fields

So help us celebrate and enjoy Faily Brakes 2.0."

What’s new in version 14.0?
-Exterminated more bugs
-Fixed game crashes, increased car crashes
-Brakes now work even less

Faily Brakes gone 'egg-streme'! Phil has hopped in his truck for an Easter egg hunt when his brakes fail again!
Now's he's out of control in this hilariously 'egg-cellent' holiday update!

Faily Brakes Easter features - Easter holiday scenery with Easter eggs, BIG carrots, bunny cupcakes as well as hidden bunny burrows to navigate!
Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and Car Selection update.

"Join Phil as he finds himself in the middle of the Faily 500!
New Indy car inspired scenery with Indianapolis skyline and Indy race track.
New and improved car selection screen, with 5 new Indianapolis 500 inspired cars and 5 new costumes."
Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements.

Join Phil and Anita in their celebration of July 4th with our new 'Freedom' Update! Race under exploding fireworks and take in the spectacle of stunt jets performing above!
Update Contains:
3 x New Cars
2 x New Costumes
1 Free Car and Costume just for updating

100% More Freedom
Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements.

"Around the world in Faily Days!

Drive to Survive! Test your skills and concentration as your car driven by Phil or Anita careens out of control with no brakes!

Avoid obstacles and hazards through forests, deserts, wastelands and snow, as well as ancient worlds and futuristic cities!

This is the ultimate Faily road trip, in this absolutely hilarious downhill disaster.

Game update features:
•Introducing the Faily World Map! Eleven of the most popular Faily Brakes themes in one huge update!
•Unlock the themes as you progress through the map including Frosty Steeps, Apocalypse Down, the Faily 500 and Super Retro!
•NEW Outback Trails theme, including “DownUnder” inspired scenery, cars and costumes.
•All themes include free ‘Secret Cars’ to find and collect!
•Unlock coins, costumes, powerups and amazing cars per section!
•NEW Power-up load-out screen. Power-up your Faily Brakes experience, by purchasing, collecting and storing PowerUps to be equipped
and used when desired."
•Join the Faily Mile Club - upgrade your status and earn miles towards your next destination

"Happy Holidays!

Play over the Holiday weekend (21st -25th Dec) and receive a special daily Present.

The ‘Holiday Themed’ track also comes with a free Car and Costume, yours to keep when the Theme disappears in the New Year.

Thanks for playing the ‘Faily’ Games and all the best for 2019 from Phil, Anita and team at Spunge Games."

"Around the world in Faily Days!

Swerve around obstacles and jump across chasms in forests, deserts, wastelands and more! Follow the trail of adventure through ancient worlds and futuristic cities!

This new update features huge upgrades to the Faily Brakes World Tour experience! Jump on the Road-Trip and see how your favourite driving experience has been upgraded!

Want to rack up the miles even faster! Join the new 'VIP Club' and gain huge boosts, along with heaps of awesome content along the way!

Join Phil Faily on his Fail-tastic Adventure Now!"
Bug fixes and improvements.

"Enjoy endless rag doll action, cool and crazy cars, and spectacular high impact crashes. Avoiding the obstacles is the aim of the game but crashing is twice the fun.

Machine Guns, Shields and Rockets are back on the track and there's a new faster quick play between runs for lots more Faily action."

What’s new in version 14.0?
-Exterminated more bugs
-Fixed game crashes, increased car crashes
-Brakes now work even less
Phil has done some tidying up to reduce crashes, improve game play and stomp on some bugs.  Enjoy the rag-doll action and mighty crashes and thanks for playing.
